Legal is not the question about this video?
Morals are!
There should be a moral code where we agree that TPB is not for sharing videos that glorify murder, childabuse, rape, suicide etc.

There are enough problems with copyright related issues where the authorities in different countries try to shut us down, let us not give them a new excuse to try and shot us down.

For all fans of jihad-videos, murder-videos and child-porn I am sure there are underground forums where you can share your strange passion. Just dont do it on TPB

Moral?   This is hardly the place to start discussing moral rules. Secondly you only want to apply moral rules to what suits you.

What if I say that it is immoral to have all this porn on this site? Would you back me up on that?   My guess is 95% of the guys now say NO. 

The problem with today's society is that people are so molded by media into how they should think.  You think this is immoral because it is muslims shooting westerners.  Show a clip of a helicopter gunning down arabs or a missilesblowing up a building in a city full of civilians and it is good action.

I am no big fan islam myself. I think sharia law and their view of women in most cases stinks.
But that is no reason to start applying double standards.  
1)This site is full of clips of people dying and there has been no complaints unless the dying is becasue of muslims. 
2) Iraq was invaded on false grounds and 650,000+ Iraqis have died as a result and they have every right to hate US for that.
